page.title: 07COMMUNICATIONS FORRES WEST
page.content:
Non transport
Includes Tele-communications, postal services etc. The main post office in the area is situated towards the west end of Forres High Street. There is a postal service which served the outlying areas; such as Kintessack, Broom of Moy and Mundole Caravan Site. As well as the Post Office there are post boxes in the area mentioned. Also at the far east end of the High Street there is a sub Post Office at the rear of a Newsagents. The telephone plays an important part in the role of our communications network. Each housing scheme has a telephione within easy reach. The lowest charge for a local charge is 10p.
